Several unrelated frontend pages/state summary files were also modified, which were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure every MotivationalVideo entry whose youtubeUrl contains the substring 'placeholder' is updated to a real playable YouTube URL, and its thumbnailUrl is updated to https://img.youtube.com/vi/<VIDEO_ID>/maxresdefault.jpg using the same extracted VIDEO_ID; no youtubeUrl values contain 'placeholder' afterward.
missing_requirements.reason: The only required change is in frontend/src/content/mentalPerformance/motivationalLifeLessonsVideos.ts, but the diff for this file is truncated; it shows some entries updated to real YouTube URLs, but does not provide enough evidence that *all* placeholder URLs throughout the dataset were replaced and that none remain.
